name: Son of Egypt
description:
Seemingly in response to the call for tens of centuries, the Son of Egypt finally returns to this majestic land with spectacular views and splendid civilization! His mind is only on running and running, to take up his sacred mission and to explore the unsolved mysteries. However, success is never granted but earned. Obstacles will always be there on your way. Now intellect and agility are more than important to successful arrival at the destination.

How to play: tap to jump, and hold to jump higher and further. If you fall off or dash against barriers, you will have to restart the journey.

Go ahead and start the adventure as Son of Egypt!

Stunning Features:
- Plenty of characters to choose from
- Quick tempo & Fast rhythm
- Beautifully visual effects
- Lively background music
- Easy & Addictive
- Challenge your friends
